name: Save the Environment Runner
description:
• Save the Environment by catching the Toxic Bottles before the explode. When they explode they will make a hole in the earth. 
  • Catch at least 20 Toxic Bottles within 60 seconds to advance to the next level.
  • Watch out for the bird that might steal some Toxic Bottles. When that happens you will lose a point.
  • Move left and right  in the scene with the arrow keys and jump with the space bar.
